title: Very slow speeds when downloading this game again!
body:
This is my speed test run I did just for this post.
Since I have to down this game once and then copy the contents by usb to another computer...
Why am I downloading it at 55kbs.. Thats kbs not KBS.

It is insanely slow!!!!!!!!!!!!

http://beta.speedtest.net/result/6294175482


Edited 
Due to link!
